column1: # First matching rule wins. Patterns use shell-style globs.
# Use SAT unless a command is intentionally expected to be UNSAT.
models/system/tool_spec.pf|Obl_A_roadmap_alignment|SAT|Canonical roadmap alignment obligation must be satisfiable.
